title: Covid: Italy rolls out 'green pass' for public venue access
content:
1. Covid: Italy rolls out 'green pass' for public venue access  BBC News
  2. Italy Begins Requiring Covid 'Green Pass' for Indoor Activities  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  3. Italians (Mostly) Embrace a ‘Green Pass’ to Prove Vaccination on Its First Day  The New York Times

  5. Italy requires vaccination proof for bars and restaurants  CBS News
